name: Joan Collins Movies Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Joan co-starred in a Hope and Crosby "Road" movie. Which one?
questions.explanation:
Road to Hong Kong.

	Why not? No more or less entertaining than the other "Road" movies.

questions.text: Joan also starred in a sci-fi movie in which she was menaced by what type of creatures?
questions.explanation:
Ants.

	"Empire of the Ants". She was at that time returning to a second career.

questions.text: Joan starred in "The Opposite Sex" as a siren trying to lure a man away from what all-American woman?
questions.explanation:
June Allyson.

	Wholseome June is pitted against sexy Joan. Leslie Nielsen plays the husband. Not bad.

questions.text: Joan appeared in "The Wayward Bus". Who wrote the novel on which the movie was based?
questions.explanation:
John Steinbeck.

	One of his lesser known works. Ensemble cast.

questions.text: Joan had an early role in "The Virgin Queen". Who played the title role?
questions.explanation:
Bette Davis.

	Bette came back after some time away - for this? Just so-so.

questions.text: Which of these westerns included Joan in the cast?
questions.explanation:
The Bravados.

	It also starred Gregory Peck in a revenge-based story. "River" starred Marilyn Monroe, "Queen" starred Barbara Stanwyck, and "Guitar" starred Joan Crawford.

questions.text: Joan had a starring role in "Rally 'Round the Flags, Boy". Who was her leading man?
questions.explanation:
Paul Newman.

	Newman starred (with Joanne Woodward) in this light comedy from Max Shulman (of "Dobie Gillis" fame). (She does a little song-and-dance.)

questions.text: Joan had a starring role in "The Girl in the Red Velvet Swing". Which description of the film is accurate?
questions.explanation:
Drama based on fact.

	The movie is based on the romantic triangle at the early part of the twentieth century which involved Evelyn Nesbit (Collins), Stanford White (Ray Milland) and Harry Thaw (Farley Granger). Thaw shot White due to White's involvement with Nesbit.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Joan in "Sea Wife"?
questions.explanation:
Richard Burton.

	Adrift at sea, etc. Reasonably interesting.

questions.text: Which is NOT a Joan Collins Movie?
questions.explanation:
Paleface.

	Sister Jackie wrote "Stud" and "Bitch". "Pharaohs" was (as you might expect) a tale of ancient Egypt. "Paleface" starred Jane Russell.
